installCommand:
pip install python-multipart==0.0.9 -t api/_vendor && python - <<'PY'
import sys,importlib,site,os
sys.path.insert(0,'api/_vendor')
try:
  m=importlib.import_module('multipart')
  print('MULTIPART_OK',getattr(m,'__version__',None),m.__file__)
except Exception as e:
  print('MULTIPART_FAIL',repr(e))
PY
&& pip install -r requirements.txt -t api/_vendor
